casebody.data:
No. 666, No. 669, No. 670,

Misc.

Misc.

Misc.

Perry v. United States; McGuire v. United States; and Blumner v. United States. Anthony F. Marra for petitioner in No. 666, Mise., Jerome J. Londin for petitioner in No. 669, Mise., and Eugene P. Souther for petitioner in No. 670, Mise. Solicitor General Griswold, Assistant Attorney General Vinson and Beatrice Rosenberg for the United States in all three cases.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Reported below: 381 F. 2d 306.
